official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning on November 7, 1976, as National Respiratory Therapy Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue a proclamation designating the week beginning on November 7, 1976, as "National Respiratory Therapy Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week beginning on November 7, 1976, as National Respiratory Therapy Week.
